nodes.text: The Bespin Dancer was a ship that served in the Republic Navy during the Clone Wars. In 21 BBY, it was destroyed with all hands lost during the Battle of Falleen, which was fought against the Confederacy of Independent Systems. Queen Breha Organa's cousin served as a tactical officer aboard the ship and was killed during the battle. Jedi Master Obi-Wan Kenobi later reported the fact to Senator Bail Prestor Organa of Alderaan, the husband of Queen Breha. However, as the details of the Battle of Falleen included sensitive information, Kenobi advised Organa not to tell his wife about the event.
The Bespin Dancer was first mentioned in The Clone Wars: Wild Space, a novel written by Karen Miller and published in 2008.
